text: Kevin Anthony "Moochie" Corcoran (June 10, 1949 - October 6, 2015) was an American director, producer, and former child actor. He worked as a child in many of Walt Disney's most popular movies of the late 1950s and 1960s. These include Savage Sam, Old Yeller, Toby Tyler, Pollyanna, The Shaggy Dog, and Swiss Family Robinson. Corcoran died from colon cancer at the age of 66. ==Other websites== * *Allmovie bio *Disney Legends profile *Profile on The Original Mickey Mouse Club Show website Category:Actors from Santa Monica, California Category:American television directors Category:American television producers Category:American child actors Category:Deaths from colorectal cancer Category:1949 births Category:2015 deaths
title: Kevin Corcoran
